description:
Calculate hour of the year from month, day, hour, minute.
-
code:
try:
    from ladybug.dt import DateTime
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug:\n\t{}'.format(e))
try:
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import turn_off_old_tag
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))
turn_off_old_tag(ghenv.Component)


month = _month_ or 9
day = _day_ or 21
hour = _hour_ if _hour_ is not None else 12
minute = _minute_ or 0

datetime = DateTime(month, day, hour, minute)
hoy = datetime.hoy
doy = datetime.doy
date = datetime
name: LB Calculate HOY
